meanings.definition: Used as a mild expression of surprise or emotion.
meanings.sent2: Oh gosh, I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent3: Gosh, I can't believe I ate the whole cake!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a ray of sunshine, gosh.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks lit up the sky, gosh, it was beautiful.

meanings.sent1: He used the word 'gosh' instead of 'God'.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally said 'gosh' in church and everyone giggled.
meanings.sent4: The old book had 'gosh' written in place of 'God'.
meanings.sent5: The teacher reminded the students to use 'gosh' respectfully.
